availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Thomas Osburn (Hopkins Co., KY, gunsmith )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, gunsmith. Kentucky native. Married to Ann Elizabeth "Lizzie" Waetzel Osburn. Father of Charles O. Osburn. Gunsmith in Caldwell County in 1850. Gunsmith in Hopkins County in 1860. Gunsmith in Hopkins County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 343B-344A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Madisonville, p. 835.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Madisonville, p. 170B.

Find A Grave, "W. Thomas Osburn (15 Mar 1831-29 Jul 1896)," Memorial #62659975, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/62659975 (accessed October 8, 2020).
